content.raw: I'm looking at the config cmake files generated under `<CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX>/lib/cmake/ignition-transport4` and I don't see any place where the `ignition-transport4_CXX_FLAGS` variable is set. Is this variable supposed to be set here or is there an alternative way of passing flags?
content.html: I'm looking at the config cmake files generated under <CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX>/lib/cmake/ignition-transport4 and I don't see any place where the ignition-transport4_CXX_FLAGS variable is set. Is this variable supposed to be set here or is there an alternative way of passing flags?
